text: Kogda cheloveka porazhayet kakaya-libo beda, on vzyvayet k svoyemu Gospodu, vozvrashchayas' k Nemu [posle zabveniya Yego]. Potom, kogda On odarit yego milost'yu ot Sebya, chelovek zabyvayet togo, k komu obrashchalsya [za pomoshch'yu] prezhde, i poklonyayetsya pomimo Allakha drugim bogam, chtoby sbit' s puti [lyudey].
